title: NBehave
summary: Essentially an assertion, mocking, and stubbing framework for the Unity game engine. Built to be customized to the Unity game dev environment.
long_summary: Essentially an assertion, mocking, and stubbing framework for the Unity game engine. At the time I made this, I was struggling figuring out how to test things in Unity, and so decided why not just make my own testing framework, custom tailored to Unity development?

gallery.caption: A sample test showing how NBehave works
